001package io.jstach.rainbowgum;
002
003import java.net.URI;
004import java.net.URISyntaxException;
005import java.util.EnumMap;
006import java.util.Map;
007import java.util.Objects;
008import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
009import java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantReadWriteLock;
010import java.util.function.Supplier;
011
012import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogEncoder.EncoderProvider;
013import io.jstach.rainbowgum.LogOutput.OutputType;
014import io.jstach.rainbowgum.format.StandardEventFormatter;
015
016/**
017 * Encoder registry
018 */
019public sealed interface LogEncoderRegistry extends EncoderProvider {
020
021        /**
022         * Registers an encoder by uri scheme.
023         * @param scheme encoder name.
024         * @param encoder loaded encoder
025         */
026        public void register(String scheme, EncoderProvider encoder);
027
028        /**
029         * Associates a default formatter with a specific output type
030         * @param outputType output type to use for finding best default formatter.
031         * @return formatter for output type.
032         */
033        public LogEncoder encoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType);
034
035        /**
036         * Sets a default formatter for a specific output type.
037         * @param outputType output type.
038         * @param formatter formatter.
039         */
040        public void setEncoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType, Supplier<? extends LogEncoder> formatter);
041
042}
043
044final class DefaultEncoderRegistry implements LogEncoderRegistry {
045
046        private final Map<String, EncoderProvider> providers = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
047
048        /**
049         * Creates encoder registry
050         * @return encoder registry
051         */
052        public static LogEncoderRegistry of() {
053                return new DefaultEncoderRegistry();
054        }
055
056        private static URI normalize(URI uri) {
057                String scheme = uri.getScheme();
058                String path = uri.getPath();
059                try {
060                        if (scheme == null) {
061                                if (path == null) {
062                                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("URI is not proper: " + uri);
063                                }
064                                if (path.startsWith("./") || path.startsWith("/")) {
065                                        uri = new URI("name://" + path);
066                                }
067                                else {
068                                        uri = new URI(path + ":///");
069                                }
070                        }
071                }
072                catch (URISyntaxException e) {
073                        throw new IllegalArgumentException("URI is not proper: " + uri);
074                }
075                return uri;
076        }
077
078        @Override
079        public LogProvider<LogEncoder> provide(LogProviderRef ref) {
080                var uri = ref.uri();
081                uri = normalize(uri);
082                var _ref = new DefaultLogProviderRef(uri, ref.keyOrNull());
083                /*
084                 * TODO file bug with checker as it should have found scheme to be null.
085                 */
086                String scheme = uri.getScheme();
087                if (scheme == null) {
088                        throw new IllegalStateException("bug. uri was not normalized");
089                }
090
091                var provider = providers.get(scheme);
092                if (provider == null) {
093                        throw new LogProviderRef.NotFoundException("No encoder found. URI=" + uri);
094                }
095
096                return provider.provide(_ref);
097        }
098
099        @Override
100        public void register(String scheme, EncoderProvider encoder) {
101                /*
102                 * TODO maybe check if one is already registered and do something?
103                 */
104                providers.put(scheme, encoder);
105        }
106
107        private final ReentrantReadWriteLock lock = new ReentrantReadWriteLock();
108
109        private final EnumMap<OutputType, Supplier<? extends LogEncoder>> formatters = new EnumMap<>(OutputType.class);
110
111        /**
112         * Associates a default formatter with a specific output type
113         * @param outputType output type to use for finding best default formatter.
114         * @return encoder for output type.
115         */
116        @Override
117        public LogEncoder encoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType) {
118                lock.readLock().lock();
119                try {
120                        var formatter = formatters.get(outputType);
121                        if (formatter == null) {
122                                return LogEncoder.of(StandardEventFormatter.builder().build());
123                        }
124                        return Objects.requireNonNull(formatter.get());
125                }
126                finally {
127                        lock.readLock().unlock();
128                }
129        }
130
131        /**
132         * Sets a default formatter for a specific output type.
133         * @param outputType output type.
134         * @param formatter formatter.
135         */
136        @Override
137        public void setEncoderForOutputType(OutputType outputType, Supplier<? extends LogEncoder> formatter) {
138                lock.writeLock().lock();
139                try {
140                        formatters.put(outputType, formatter);
141                }
142                finally {
143                        lock.writeLock().unlock();
144                }
145        }
146
147}
